features: [MAKING YOUR LETTER DISTINCTIVE] These stationary set is perfect for who loves to write handwritten letters. The letter writing paper with some decoration at corner and slightly color background makes calligraphy or writing clear but elegant and impressive.
[LUXURIOUS LETTER WIRINTING MATERIAL AND PRINTABLE] Both letter paper and envelopes are printed on smooth recycled paper, compatible with inkjet or laser printer, fountain pen or gel pen.
[SEALING ENVELOPES SAVE YOUR TIME] Days of envelopes without glue are gone. Our stationary includes self-sticking envelopes which ends up sending a letter easily.
[NEAT PACKAGE INDIVIDUAL PACK] Each stationery set contains 6 individual packs with 8 Japanese stationary paper & 4 envelopes of each design, totally 6 different colors assorted.
[30 DAYS GUARANTEE] We are confident that our stationary paper and envelopes set will be impressive you and we offer 30 days guarantee of withdrawing money back if you are not satisfied with them.
body.description: Both you and your receiver will be impressive by the vivid printing and stylish pattern letterThe paper is beautiful and the envelopes are an extra nice touch. They are very distinctive and make writing to someone with this set seem like you really respect them and appreciate them. FeaturesMaterial: Smooth uncoated recycled paper Size: Stationery Paper - 7.50” x 10.5” (19x26.5 cm), Envelope - 8.50” x 4.30” (21.5x11 cm)Package: 8 pcs stationeries & 4 pcs envelopes of each pattern, 6 designs assorted. Each set of letter sheet and matched envelopes are packed in an individual poly bag and then 6 different bags put into another poly bag.Order Now to avoid disopointment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Great Qualitied, Decent sized matching Stationary paper& envelopes!! I love it!!
reviews.reviewText: I am Absolutely thrilled, pleased, in love, and infatuated with this perticular stationary pack. I Adore how it All looks just as they're described, and Yes the print,color, paper and matching envelopes all look just like the photos show. The Perfectly matched envelopes come with a pre glue strip on them. The sizes all hold true to their descriptioniveness, not as big as a full size computer sheet of paper, but they're honestly not much smaller than that at all. They're much bigger than just a typical 5'7 or smaller sized stationary sheet. The paper is really soft and smooth,making writing / drawing on them very easy. Theyre isn't anything I can Honestly say that I don't like about any of the stationary I ordered. They're not see through. And the print on the backside ties in with the way it looks on the front side. They don't look, feel or sound cheap✓✓✓. The quality and quantity are both worth the money in my personal opinion. And so far its met all of my expectations. Pretty stationary writing paper✓ Beautiful picture and colors✓✓ Sturdiness and Decent Quality/Quantity✓✓ Really nice Quality*And Worth the money✓✓✓✓I'd definitely, Definitely highly recommend this to anyone looking for pretty stationary. I can't justify an opinion as to if theyll fit in standard sized printers or if things print out centered or evenily on them or not,bcus I don't have one to try them in, but I also didn't necessarily or solely buy it for that purpose alone. I more bought them so I could get back into writing again like I once used to do. To write my children,family or friends like I once did years&years ago. Or even get back into writing poetry like I once did. Again I can't express truly enough with how pleased or how tickled pink I am with finally picking out this perticular stationary pack. I completely and absolutely adore my entire Amazon order in general as a whole, after hours and days of researching what I was looking for, I found exactly what I was looking for, it really is all that I was hoping it'd be. I'm quite pleased , and extremely happy with everything I bought this time. Especially all my new Pretty stationary variety options I now have here at home to pick from anytime I decide I wanna sit and jus' write.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes A Great Gift!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE the art on this stationary! At first, I was going to use it for writing personal letters, but, I couldn't help but want to show it off. It's a great gift idea and all of my pen pals will be receiving a set. Any pre-teen or teenage girl would love it, as well. The intricate details on the designs are breath takingly beautiful and you can even write on the back of the paper because the design includes all that space! The envelopes are tall, instead of long, and offers lovely authenticity. I simply LOVE it and I think you will, too. : )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice and pretty. Would order again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and nice quality
reviews.reviewText: These are very pretty and nice quality. The fact that they come with envelopes is a nice bonus. My child has loved using them for pen pals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really lovely stationary but be aware of the orientation
reviews.reviewText: This is really beautiful stationary. It has a nice weight, folds easily and took the ink well.Please note however that it is not oriented for english script ( I did not find this to be a problem but you will cover some of the images with ink) and the envelopes are seal at the narrow end ( as opposed to standard US envelopes). The envelopes are also a bit hard to address if you intend to mail them directly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for writing letters
reviews.reviewText: I have a project for one of my classes where I needed to write several letters to residents at a homeless shelter. I went to three stores looking for stationery, but all I could find were cards, or very small paper for writing notes. I read the reviews on this paper before buying it, and there really was no need. This paper is beautiful! I ran them through my printer to add lines, because I cannot write straight to save my life. I used Tul brand ink pens to write my letters, and was pleasantly surprised that they did not bleed through the paper at all! The paper came packaged nicely, with each design and their matching envelopes in their own packaging. I will be buying more soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is THE CUTEST stationary ever. I absolutely love the style/design of the paper and envelopes. It always made me excited to write to my BF that was deployed since it was cute and more personal than just plain white envelopes and paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, good quality
reviews.reviewText: This stationery is beautiful, and has color on both sides. The front has more design, but the back also has a little of the design. As you can see in the pictures, I used a calligraphy marker, which is very dark, and it didn't show through to the other side. The envelope opens from the short side instead of the long side, which makes it look a little weird when writing the address the regular way, parallel with the long side of the envelope. I would buy this stationery again. Lovely designs, 6 different designs/colors, and good quality.

I got these for my grandma as a gift, since she loves writing letters and she loved it so much! I was very impressed with the quality of the designs on the note pads. All 6 different designs were beautifully made & vibrant in colour. Very happy with my purchase!
Das hübsche Briefpapier wird zu Weihnachten an ein 12jähriges Mädchen verschenkt, das tatsächlich noch Briefe schreibt. Ich finde es ansprechend und hoffe, dem Mädchen gefällt es auch.
Tout est conforme à ce que l'on voit pour commander. Merci parfait en tout. Bien enveloppé. On est averti de l'arrivée.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this writing paper. I've been using it on and off for a couple of years and I write letters for family and friends on it, usually with a fountain pen. The letters are always very well received and make the recipients smile, in part because of how beautiful the paper is. The colour tones are fantastic and the nature/floral type designs are really eye catching. I love the Japanese feel to some of them especially. The paper is really good quality, easy to write on and the matching envelopes are stunning and premium feeling.I was in love with these on first impression and 2 years later, I still am!Highly recommended!
Me ha sorprendido. Son incluso más bonitas que en la foto. Totalmente recomendado
